message:
WHIRR-180. ListClusterCommand.run throws a NullPointerException for unrecognized service names. Contributed by Andrei Savu.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/whirr/trunk@1054523 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

file.patch:
@@ -70,6 +70,9 @@ Trunk (unreleased changes)
     WHIRR-165. Hadoop integration tests fail due to WHIRR-160 changes.
     (tomwhite)
 
+    WHIRR-180. ListClusterCommand.run throws a NullPointerException for
+    unrecognized service names. (Andrei Savu via tomwhite)
+
 Release 0.2.0 - 2010-11-04
 
   NEW FEATURES
